home.subtitle: Download TikTok videos in HD — with or without watermark. Free & fast.
home.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid TikTok URL.
home.step1: Open TikTok and copy the video link (share → Copy link).
home.step2: Paste the URL in the box above.
home.step3: Click "Get Download Links" and wait a moment.
home.step4: Choose MP4 (with or without watermark) and download.
home.metaTitle: TikTok Downloader HD — Save Videos Without Watermark Free | CosmoVid

faq.title: FAQ
faq.howItWorksAnswer: Paste a TikTok video link in the box on the homepage and click "Get Download Links". We fetch the video and show you direct download links for MP4 (with or without watermark).
faq.legalAnswer: This tool is for personal use only. Respect copyright and TikTok's Terms of Service. Do not redistribute or use downloaded content commercially without permission. We are not affiliated with TikTok.
faq.metaTitle: FAQ: How to Download TikTok Videos HD — No Watermark | CosmoVid
